parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Regulator/Rectifier and Stator Wiring Connector Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the wiring connectors attaching the regulator/rectifier and stator can cause a fire, leading to a risk of injury or accident, and potentially resulting in costly repairs.
symptoms: White smoke emitting from under the rear seat
oil present in the area surrounding the regulator/rectifier
wires burned or melted
junction/box headlight relay switch failure
loss of headlight function.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Oil Leakage Causing Rear Tire Loss of Control
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Oil leakage can cause the rear tire to lose traction, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially severe injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Rear tire spins out of control
especially when turning corners
oil leakage noticed on the ground or on the motorcycle
sudden loss of traction
motorcycle instability.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the clutch basket can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injury or death. If the broken pieces get caught inside the crankshaft, the engine can lock up, leading to catastrophic consequences.
symptoms: The clutch basket explodes or breaks into pieces
the clutch locks up in gear (especially 4th gear)
knocking or rattling noise when starting the engine
engine sounds like a loose bolt inside
noise disappears when the clutch is pulled.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to properly complete recall repairs can lead to continued safety risks and potential accidents.
symptoms: Dealer fails to complete recall work
asks consumer to pick up vehicle without correcting recall issues
or fails to reassemble vehicle properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A cracked fuel tank can cause fuel to leak, leading to a fire hazard and potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Fuel tank has a hairline crack
fuel leaks through the crack
recall repair does not resolve the issue
dealer refuses to warranty the repair.
